ORDER
The learned counsel for the petitioners prays that the
petition be dismissed as withdrawn without prejudice to
their right to move afresh. It is also prayed that the original
documents produced along with this petition be returned
back to him.
Permission is granted. This petition is dismissed as
withdrawn.
Sd/-
